tool_description: Builds comprehensive executive dashboards consolidating fulfillment analytics, performance metrics, and strategic insights into executive-ready reports and visualizations.

dashboard_type.description: Type of dashboard to build: executive_summary, operational_detail, strategic_overview, performance_scorecard

report_frequency.description: Reporting frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

stakeholder_level.description: Target stakeholder level: c_suite, vp_level, director_level, manager_level

key_metrics.description: Key metrics to highlight in dashboard

visual_format.description: Primary visual format: charts, tables, mixed, infographic

error_messages: Invalid dashboard type: Use one of [executive_summary, operational_detail, strategic_overview, performance_scorecard]
Invalid report frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly]
Invalid stakeholder level: Use one of [c_suite, vp_level, director_level, manager_level]
Invalid key metrics: Ensure metrics are valid and between 3-15 items
Invalid comparison periods: Use combinations of [previous_period, year_over_year, quarter_over_quarter, same_period_last_year]
Invalid visual format: Use one of [charts, tables, mixed, infographic]
Invalid export formats: Use combinations of [pdf, powerpoint, excel, web, json]
Insufficient data: Some requested metrics lack sufficient data for dashboard generation
usage: Specify dashboard_type, report_frequency, stakeholder_level, and key_metrics. Configure additional options like forecasting, visual format, and export options to create tailored executive dashboards.

dashboard_url.description: URL link to the generated dashboard

summary_insights.description: Key insights highlighted in the dashboard

metric_scores.description: Current scores for tracked key metrics

trend_indicators.description: Trend indicators for key performance areas
